title: "Do these magnetic experiments warrant further examination by scientists?"
first_phrase: This text is a report of some experiments conducted by a magnétiseur (an individual who claims to have the ability to manipulate magnetic fields), where three young men were brought to a public hall to prove the claims of the magnétiseur. The experiments were a success and received thunderous applause from the public. However, the author criticizes a physician's methods of conducting experiments that resulted in unnecessary harm to a young lady. The text ends with an incident in which the same doctor almost caused one of the young men to hit his head on the floor.
